mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cg_${po.tableSuffix} ( rf_id, rf_type, type_id, busi_type, busi_no, churu, vender_id, s_id, to_s_id, sys, sign_tag, busi_date, create_by) VALUES (#{po.rfId}, #{po.rfType}, #{po.typeId}, #{po.busiType}, #{po.busiNo}, #{po.churu}, #{po.venderId}, #{po.sId}, #{po.toSId}, #{po.sys}, #{po.signTag}, #{po.busiDate}, #{po.createBy})
